RobertHost is proud to launch a new LET special. Servers are located in Dallas, TX. **Very limited stock.**

**Full Specs:**
 - 512mb RAM + 512mb VSwap
 - 1,000GB bandwidth @ 1Gbp/s
 - Redundant network
 - 10GB RAID 10 SSD space
 - 2 E3-1230 cores (fair use)
 - 1 IPv4 address
 - Unmanaged
 - Price: $5 
[**Order here.**](http://roberthost.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=14)

If you have questions, let us know. Thanks for looking.
